name: Avi Hossain
description: Honda CB Hornet 160R Pros 1. No vibration even at 105 kmph. 2. Better engine coolant, u cant feel engine heat at all. 3. Power loss issue reduced. 4. Unchanged engine sound after 80 km ride without break. 5. Better throttle response. Cons Very poor throttle response at cold start. But this issue solved after 15 min of riding. Overall impression : Recommended
